p: Specific seroreactivity to crude total L. infantum antigen (CTLA) was not detected before challenge in any vaccinated hamster. Seroreactivity against recombinant antigens could not be evaluated in groups immunized with T. ni protein extracts –PROT, DNA-PROT, and control (C)– due to the non-specific responses induced against larva antigens. In the DNA group, specific responses were not detected against the recombinant antigens KMPII, TRYP, or PAPLE22, with only one hamster showing specific anti-rLACK antibodies.
